title: Cryptocurrency heist hacker returns $260m in funds
description: The hacker behind the $600m Poly Network cryptocurrency heist has posted a Q&A on the blockchain.
content:
By Mary-Ann RussonBusiness reporter, BBC News
The hacker behind one of the largest ever cryptocurrency heists ever has returned almost half of the $600m (£433m) stolen assets.
Yesterday, blockchain… [+5117 chars]
